c74object.name: o.routepack
c74object.description: Combine items into an output list. The arguments and the "initial" attribute determine the list format and types of the list elements.

inlet.digest: Input to be routed and packed

objarg.name: selectors
objarg.description: Arguments can be a mix of ints, floats, or symbols. The number of arguments determines how many numbers will be packed. The maximum arguments length is 256.

method.name: list
method.digest: Pack item (int/float/symbol) based on a match
method.description: If the first item of the message is the same as one of the arguments of o.routepack, the following value is packed into the output list. If the first item does not match any of the arguments, the entire message is passed out the rightmost outlet.

attribute.name: initial
attribute.description: Define the initial value to output as well as the output list format (int/float/symbol) and the initial. (default = 0)

entry.name: anything
entry.description: The first item of any message received in the inlet is compared with the arguments. If it matches one of the arguments, the following value is packed into the output list. Otherwise, the entire message is passed out the rightmost outlet. Just like the pack, o.routepack will only trigger the left outlet if a received message corresponds to the first element of o.routepack arguments.
